actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose: The EclecticIQ group name must be provided for this action to run successfully. Either in the source parameter, or the asset configuration.

Action creates Indicator entity in The EclecticIQ Intelligence Center. Group name used as source must be provided for this action to run successfully. Either in the source parameter, or the asset configuration.

actions.description: Query EclecticIQ Intelligence Center for entities

observable.description: Observable value to query related entities
observable.name: observable

entity_title.description: Text to search inside entity title.
entity_title.name: entity_title

entity_type.description: Type of entity to limit query
entity_type.name: entity_type

actions.description: Query EclecticIQ Intelligence Center for entity by its ID

entity_id.description: Entity ID in EclecticIQ format, for example: a86f8393-eff6-4b31-b203-f63152be5a43
entity_id.name: entity_id

actions.description: Make HTTP GET request to EclecticIQ Intelligence Center

uri.description: EclecticIQ URI excluding Intelligence Cetner address but including API version and params if needed. e.g. /private/status
uri.name: uri

uri.description: EclecticIQ URI excluding Intelligence Cetner address but including API version and params if needed.
uri.name: uri

actions.description: Make HTTP DELETE request to EclecticIQ Intelligence Center

uri.description: EclecticIQ URI excluding Intelligence Cetner address but including API version and params if needed.
uri.name: uri

actions.description: Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality

container_id.description: Container IDs to limit the ingestion to
container_id.name: container_id

start_time.description: Start of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
start_time.name: start_time

end_time.description: End of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
end_time.name: end_time

container_count.description: Maximum number of container records to query for
container_count.name: container_count

artifact_count.description: Maximum number of artifact records to query for
artifact_count.name: artifact_count
